verses.translation: Those who stay away from grave sins and indecency (should know that) for their trivial sins your Lord's forgiveness is vast. He knows best about you. When He created you from the earth and when you were embryos in your mother's wombs. Do not consider yourselves very great. God knows best who is the most righteous person.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), have you ever seen the one who has turned away (from guidance),

verses.content: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
verses.translation: and grudgingly spends very little for the cause of God?

verses.content: أَعِندَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he possess the knowledge of the unseen, thus, he sees (all things)?

verses.content: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Has not he been informed of the contents of the Book of Moses

verses.content: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
verses.translation: and about Abraham who fulfilled his duty (to God)?

verses.content: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Certainly no one will bear the responsibility of the sins of another,

verses.content: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: nor can man achieve anything without hard labor.

verses.content: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: He will certainly see the result of his labor

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.translation: and will be fully recompensed for his deeds.

verses.content: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: To your Lord will all things eventually return.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who causes laughter and weeping.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.translation: It is He who causes death and gives life.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who has created spouses, male and female,

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: from a discharged living germ

verses.content: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and on Him depends the life hereafter.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who grants people temporary and durable wealth.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who is the Lord of Sirius.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who utterly destroyed the ancient tribes of Ad,

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: Thamud,

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: and the people of Noah; they were the most unjust and rebellious people.

verses.content: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who turned upside down the people of Lot

verses.content: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: and covered them with torment.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: About which of the bounties of your Lord can they persistently dispute?

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: This is a (Prophet) like that of the ancient warners (Prophets).

verses.content: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
verses.translation: The Day of Judgment is drawing nearer.

verses.content: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: No one besides God can rescue a soul from hardship.

verses.content: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.translation: Does this statement seem strange to them

verses.content: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.translation: and do they laugh instead of weeping,

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: indulging in carelessly idle games?

verses.content: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
verses.translation: So prostrate yourselves before God and worship him.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour of Doom is drawing near and the moon is rent asunder.

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: Whenever they see a miracle, they turn away from it and say, "This is just a powerful magic".

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: They have rejected it and have followed their own desires, but all matters will be settled (by God).

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: They have certainly received the kind of news in which there is a lesson and strong words of wisdom,

verses.content: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: but the warnings have proved to have no effect on them.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), leave them alone. On the day when they will be called to a terrible punishment,

verses.content: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: they will come out of their graves, their eyes cast down, hastening towards their Summoner as locusts rushing about.

verses.content: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: These disbelievers will say, "This is a hard day".

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah, who lived before them, had also rejected (Our guidance). They rejected Our servant and said, "He is an insane person so let us drive him away".

verses.content: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
verses.translation: Noah prayed, "Lord, help me; I am defeated".

verses.content: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: We opened the gates of the sky and water started to pour down.

verses.content: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: We caused the earth to burst forth with springs so that the waters could come together for a predestined purpose.

verses.content: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: We carried him, (Noah), on a vessel built with boards fixed together with nails,

verses.content: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: which floated on the water before Our very eyes. The flood was a recompense for the deeds of the disbelievers.

verses.content: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We made (the story of Noah) as evidence of the Truth. However, is there anyone who would take heed?

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How terrible was My torment and the result of (their disregard) of My warning.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Quran easy to understand, but is there anyone who would pay attention?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of `Ad rejected Our guidance. How terrible was My torment and the result (of their disregard) of My warning.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: On an unfortunate day We sent upon them a continuous violent wind

verses.content: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: which hurled people around like uprooted trunks of palm-trees.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How terrible was Our torment and the result of (their disregard) of Our warning.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Quran easy to understand, but is there anyone who would pay attention?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Thamud rejected Our warnings.

verses.content: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: They said, "Should we follow only one person among us. We shall be clearly in error and in trouble (if we do so).

verses.content: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: How is it that he has received guidance? In fact, he is the most untruthfull and arrogant person".

verses.content: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: (We told Salih), "Tomorrow they will know who is the most arrogant liar.

verses.content: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: We are sending the she-camel to them to test them. So watch them and be patient.

verses.content: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: Tell them that each one of them has the right to have a certain share of water".

verses.content: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: They called together their companions and agreed to slay the she-camel.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How terrible was My punishment and warning.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: We sent upon them a single blast of sound and they were left like hay to be used by the cattle.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We made the Quran easy to understand, but is there anyone who would take heed?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lot rejected Our warning.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: We sent down upon them a violent sandstorm (which destroyed them all) except for the family of Lot, whom We saved in the early morning by Our favor.

verses.content: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: Thus do We recompense the grateful ones.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Lot warned them against Our torment, but they persistently disputed it.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: They demanded that he turn over his guests to them.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: We struck their faces, blinded them and said, "Suffer Our torment of which you were warned".

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: One early morning Our torment brought upon them utter destruction. We said, "Suffer Our torment of which you were warned".

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Quran easy to understand, but is there anyone who would pay attention?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: The Pharaoh and his people had also received Our warning,

verses.content: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: but they rejected all Our miracles. So We seized them in the way that a Majestic and All-powerful One would.

verses.content: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَـٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are you disbelievers mightier than those of the nations which We destroyed before or have you received amnesty through the ancient Scriptures?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Do they say, "We shall be victorious because we are united?"

verses.content: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: (Let them know that) this united group will soon run away in defeat.

verses.content: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: In fact, the Hour of Doom is the time for them to suffer. The suffering of this hour is the most calamitous and the most bitter (of all suffering).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: The sinful ones will face the destructive torment of hell

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: when they will be dragged on their faces into the fire and will be told, "Feel the touch of hell".

verses.content: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: We have created everything to fulfill a certain purpose.

verses.content: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: It takes only a single command from Us (to bring the Day of Judgment) and that can be achieved within the twinkling of an eye.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We destroyed many people like you (disbelievers) but is there anyone who would take heed (of Our warning)?

verses.content: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Whatever they have done has been recorded in the Books (records of the deeds).

verses.content: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: Every small or great deed is written down.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.translation: The pious ones will live in Paradise wherein streams flow,

verses.content: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: honorably seated in the presence of the All-dominant King.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ
verses.translation: The Beneficent (God)

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
verses.translation: has taught the Quran to (Muhammad).

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ
verses.translation: He created the human being

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
verses.translation: and has taught him intelligible speech.

verses.content: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.translation: The sun and moon rotate in a predestined orbit.

verses.content: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.translation: The plants and trees prostrate before Him.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: He raised the heavens and set up everything in balance,

verses.content: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: so that you would maintain justice.

verses.content: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: Therefore, maintain just measure and do not transgress against the Balance.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.translation: He spread out the earth for the people.

verses.content: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
verses.translation: There exists all kinds of fruits, palm-trees with sheathed blossoms,

verses.content: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
verses.translation: grain with its husk and aromatic herbs.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you deny?

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِن صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created the human being from clay like that used for pottery

verses.content: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: and jinn from the many colored flames of fire.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you deny?

verses.content: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.translation: He is the Lord of the East and West through all seasons.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He has made the two oceans meet each other,

verses.content: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.translation: but has created a barrier between them so that they will not merge totally.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا اللُّؤْلُؤُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: From the two oceans comes pearls and coral.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: وَلَهُ الْجَوَارِ الْمُنشَآتُ فِي الْبَحْرِ كَالْأَعْلَامِ
verses.translation: By His command, the ships with raised masts sail on the sea like mountains.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
verses.translation: Everyone on earth is destined to die.

verses.content: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Only the Supreme Essence of your Glorious and Gracious Lord will remain forever.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: يَسْأَلُهُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ
verses.translation: Everyone in the heavens and the earth depends on Him. His task in preserving His creation is continuous.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلَانِ
verses.translation: Jinn and mankind, We shall certainly settle your accounts.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: يَا مَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا مِنْ أَقْطَارِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ فَانفُذُوا ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَانٍ
verses.translation: Jinn and mankind, if you can penetrate the diameters of the heavens and the earth, do so, but you cannot do so without power and authority.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: Flames of fire and molten brass will be released against you and you will not be able to protect yourselves.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: فَإِذَا انشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَالدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: (On the Day of Judgment) when the heavens are rent asunder they will have a flowery color and flow like oil.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْأَلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: On that day there will be no need to ask mankind or jinn about his sin

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِي وَالْأَقْدَامِ
verses.translation: The guilty ones will be recognized by their faces and will be seized by their forelocks and feet.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: (The guilty ones will be told), "This is hell which the sinful ones denied".

verses.content: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ
verses.translation: They will run around in blazing fire and boiling water.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: Those who fear their Lord will have two gardens

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: ذَوَاتَا أَفْنَانٍ
verses.translation: full of various trees.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
verses.translation: In the two gardens there will be two flowing springs.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors would you then deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ
verses.translation: In them there are pairs of each kind of fruit.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍ بَطَائِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى الْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.translation: (The dwellers of Paradise) will recline on couches lined with silk brocade and it will be easy to reach the ripe fruits from the two gardens.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: There will be bashful maidens untouched by mankind or jinn before.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: jinn and mankindîwhich of the favors of your Lord would you then deny

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ الْيَاقُوتُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: who are as beautiful as rubies and pearls.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
verses.translation: Can any thing else be a response to a favor but a favor?

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: Besides this, there will be two other gardens.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: - jinn and mankind - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny

verses.content: مُدْهَامَّتَانِ
verses.translation: - dark green in color.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.translation: In these there will also be two springs gushing forth.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ
verses.translation: In both gardens there will be fruits, palm-trees, and pomegranates

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَاتٌ حِسَانٌ
verses.translation: There will be well-disciplined, beautiful maidens.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: - jinn and mankind - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny

verses.content: حُورٌ مَّقْصُورَاتٌ فِي الْخِيَامِ
verses.translation: - with big, black and white beautiful eyes, dwelling in tents.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: - jinn and mankind - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny

verses.content: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: - untouched by jinn or mankind before.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.translation: They will be reclining on plain green and beautifully printed cushions

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord would you then deny?

verses.content: تَبَارَكَ اسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, the Lord of Glory and Grace.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: When the inevitable event comes,

verses.content: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.translation: no soul will deny its coming.

verses.content: خَافِضَةٌ رَّافِعَةٌ
verses.translation: It will abase some and exalt others.

verses.content: إِذَا رُجَّتِ الْأَرْضُ رَجًّا
verses.translation: When the earth is violently shaken

verses.content: وَبُسَّتِ الْجِبَالُ بَسًّا
verses.translation: and the mountains crumbled,

verses.content: فَكَانَتْ هَبَاءً مُّنبَثًّا
verses.translation: they will become like dust scattered around.

verses.content: وَكُنتُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ثَلَاثَةً
verses.translation: On that day, you (mankind) will be divided into three groups:

verses.content: فَأَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: The people of the right hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their right hands. How happy they will be!

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: The people of the left hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their left hands. How miserable they will be!

verses.content: وَالسَّابِقُونَ السَّابِقُونَ
verses.translation: The foremost ones (in faith and virtue) - the foremost ones in receiving their reward.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: (The foremost ones) will be the nearest ones to God

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: in the beautiful Paradise.

verses.content: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Many of them will be from the ancient people

verses.content: وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and only a few of them from the later generations.

verses.content: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّوْضُونَةٍ
verses.translation: They will recline on jewelled couches

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.translation: facing one another.

verses.content: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
verses.translation: Immortal youths will serve them

verses.content: بِأَكْوَابٍ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: with goblets, jugs and cups of crystal clear wine

verses.content: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ
verses.translation: which will not cause them any intoxication or illness.

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةٍ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Also, they will be served with the fruits of their choice

verses.content: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and the flesh of birds, as they desire.

verses.content: وَحُورٌ عِينٌ
verses.translation: They will have maidens with large, lovely black and white eyes,

verses.content: كَأَمْثَالِ اللُّؤْلُؤِ الْمَكْنُونِ
verses.translation: like pearls preserved in their shells,

verses.content: جَزَاءً بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: as reward for their deeds.

verses.content: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.translation: They will not hear any unnecessary or sinful talk

verses.content: إِلَّا قِيلًا سَلَامًا سَلَامًا
verses.translation: except each other's greetings of, "Peace be with you".

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: As for the people of the right hand, how happy they will be!

verses.content: فِي سِدْرٍ مَّخْضُودٍ
verses.translation: They will live amid the thornless lot trees

verses.content: وَطَلْحٍ مَّنضُودٍ
verses.translation: and banana trees,

verses.content: وَظِلٍّ مَّمْدُودٍ
verses.translation: with fruits piled up one on the other,

verses.content: وَمَاءٍ مَّسْكُوبٍ
verses.translation: and amid the extended shade

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ
verses.translation: near to flowing water

verses.content: لَّا مَقْطُوعَةٍ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: and abundant fruits,

verses.content: وَفُرُشٍ مَّرْفُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: undiminished and never denied

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنشَأْنَاهُنَّ إِنشَاءً
verses.translation: and the noble maidens

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا
verses.translation: that We have created (for the people of the right hand).

verses.content: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: We have made them virgins,

verses.content: لِّأَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: loving and of equal age.

verses.content: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: These (people of the right hand) consist of many from the ancient

verses.content: وَثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and many from the later generations.

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ
verses.translation: As for the people on the left hand, how miserable they will be!

verses.content: فِي سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: They will live amid the scorching,

verses.content: وَظِلٍّ مِّن يَحْمُومٍ
verses.translation: scalding water and under a shadow of black smoke,

verses.content: لَّا بَارِدٍ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: neither cold nor graceful in shape.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ
verses.translation: They had lived in luxury before this

verses.content: وَكَانُوا يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى الْحِنثِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: and persisted in heinous sins.

verses.content: وَكَانُوا يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: It was they who said, "Shall we be resurrected after we die and have turned into dust and bones?

verses.content: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: Will our ancient forefathers be resurrected too?

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّ الْأَوَّلِينَ وَالْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), say, "All the ancient and later generations

verses.content: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: will be brought together for an appointment on an appointed day.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا الضَّالُّونَ الْمُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then you people who had gone astray and rejected the Truth

verses.content: لَآكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٍ مِّن زَقُّومٍ
verses.translation: will eat from the fruit of the tree of Zaqqum,

verses.content: فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: filling your bellies, with it

verses.content: فَشَارِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: and on top of this you will drink boiling water

verses.content: فَشَارِبُونَ شُرْبَ الْهِيمِ
verses.translation: like a thirsty camel".

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Such will be their dwelling on the Day of Judgment.

verses.content: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
verses.translation: It is We who have created you. Why then did you not testify to the Truth?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا تُمْنُونَ
verses.translation: Have you seen sperm?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Did you create it or was it We who created it?

verses.content: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ الْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: We have destined death for you and no one can challenge Us

verses.content: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَالَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِي مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: in replacing you with another creation like you, changing you into a form which you do not know.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: You certainly knew about (your) first development. Why do you not take heed?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا تَحْرُثُونَ
verses.translation: Have you seen what you sow?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الزَّارِعُونَ
verses.translation: Do you make it grow or is it We who make it grow?

verses.content: لَوْ نَشَاءُ لَجَعَلْنَاهُ حُطَامًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.translation: Had We wanted, We could have crushed it to bits and you would have been left to lament,

verses.content: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: crying, "We have been left to suffer loss.

verses.content: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.translation: Surely, we have been deprived (of the benefits)".

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ الْمَاءَ الَّذِي تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.translation: Have you seen the water which you drink?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ الْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنزِلُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who sent it down from the clouds or is it We who have sent it down?

verses.content: لَوْ نَشَاءُ جَعَلْنَاهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: Had We wanted, We could have made it salty. Why then do you not give thanks?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ النَّارَ الَّتِي تُورُونَ
verses.translation: Have you seen the fire which you kindle?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَا أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنشِئُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who have produced its tree or is it We who have produced it?

verses.content: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَاهَا تَذْكِرَةً وَمَتَاعًا لِّلْمُقْوِينَ
verses.translation: It is We who have made it as a reminder and a means of comfort for the people.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), glorify your Lord, the Great One.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَاقِعِ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: I do not need to swear by the setting of the stars

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَقَسَمٌ لَّوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: - which is indeed a great oath if only you knew it -

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقُرْآنٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: that this is an honorable Quran

verses.content: فِي كِتَابٍ مَّكْنُونٍ
verses.translation: preserved in a hidden Book which

verses.content: لَّا يَمَسُّهُ إِلَّا الْمُطَهَّرُونَ
verses.translation: no one can touch it except the purified ones.

verses.content: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: (This Quran) is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe.

verses.content: أَفَبِهَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَنتُم مُّدْهِنُونَ
verses.translation: Would you say that this statement is a lie?

verses.content: وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Would you reject the sustenance that you receive rather than give thanks?

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ الْحُلْقُومَ
verses.translation: Why can you not help a soul dying

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ حِينَئِذٍ تَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: right before your very eyes?

verses.content: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: We are closer to him than you, but you cannot see.

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا إِن كُنتُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِينِينَ
verses.translation: If you are true to your claim that there is no Day of Judgment,

verses.content: تَرْجِعُونَهَا إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: why can you not bring it (the soul) back (to life)?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: (If a dying soul) is of those near to God,

verses.content: فَرَوْحٌ وَرَيْحَانٌ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: it will have rest, happiness, and a beautiful Paradise.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: If it is of the people of the right hand,

verses.content: فَسَلَامٌ لَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: it will be with the people of the right hand, living in peace and security.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنَ الْمُكَذِّبِينَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: If it is of those who have rejected the Truth and have gone astray,

verses.content: فَنُزُلٌ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: its dwelling will be boiling water

verses.content: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: and the heat of hell fire.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: This is the absolute Truth and certainty.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Great One.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: All that is in the heavens and the earth glorify God. He is Majestic and All-wise.

verses.content: لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He gives life and causes things to die. He has power over all things.

verses.content: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: He is the First, the Last, the Manifest, and the Unseen and He knows all things.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days and then established His Dominion over the Throne. He knows whatever enters into the earth, what comes out of it, what descends from the sky, and what ascends to it. He is with you wherever you may be and He is Well Aware of what you do.

verses.content: لَّهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
verses.translation: To Him belong the heavens and the earth and to Him all things return.

verses.content: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: He causes night to enter into day and day into night. He knows best what all hearts contain.

verses.content: آمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَأَنفِقُوا مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Have faith in God and His Messenger and spend for His cause out of what is entrusted to you. Those who believe and spend for the cause of God will have a great reward.

verses.content: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ ۙ وَالرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِرَبِّكُمْ وَقَدْ أَخَذَ مِيثَاقَكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: If you are true indeed to this covenant, why do you not believe in God, when His Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord with whom you have made a solemn covenant?

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ آيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ لِّيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: It is He who sends illustrious revelations to His servant to take you out of darkness to light. God is Compassionate and All-merciful to you.

verses.content: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَاثُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنْ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبْلِ الْفَتْحِ وَقَاتَلَ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً مِّنَ الَّذِينَ أَنفَقُوا مِن بَعْدُ وَقَاتَلُوا ۚ وَكُلًّا وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Why do you not spend for the cause of God when to Him belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Those who spend for the cause of God and fight before victory will have higher positions than those who spend for the cause of God and fight after victory. However, to both parties God has promised good rewards. God is Well Aware of what you do.

verses.content: مَّن ذَا الَّذِي يُقْرِضُ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضَاعِفَهُ لَهُ وَلَهُ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Whoever gives a virtuous loan to God will receive double from Him in addition to an honorable reward.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ يَسْعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَانِهِم بُشْرَاكُمُ الْيَوْمَ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: On the Day of Judgment you will see the believers with their light shining in front of them and to their right. They will be told, "Paradise wherein streams flow is the glad news for you today. You will live therein forever. This is the greatest triumph".

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُولُ الْمُنَافِقُونَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتُ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا انظُرُونَا نَقْتَبِسْ مِن نُّورِكُمْ قِيلَ ارْجِعُوا وَرَاءَكُمْ فَالْتَمِسُوا نُورًا فَضُرِبَ بَيْنَهُم بِسُورٍ لَّهُ بَابٌ بَاطِنُهُ فِيهِ الرَّحْمَةُ وَظَاهِرُهُ مِن قِبَلِهِ الْعَذَابُ
verses.translation: On that day the hypocrites will say to the believers, "Please look at us so that we might benefit from your light." They will be told, "Go back and search for your own light." A barrier with a door will be placed between them. Inside it there will be mercy but outside of it there will be torment.

verses.content: يُنَادُونَهُمْ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمْ فَتَنتُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ وَارْتَبْتُمْ وَغَرَّتْكُمُ الْأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَاءَ أَمْرُ اللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
verses.translation: (Those outside) will call out, "Were we not with you?" (Those inside) will reply, "Yes, you were with us but you spent your life in disbelief and hypocrisy, wished death to (Muhammad), had doubts about his message and let your longings deceive you until the decree of God came to pass. The devil deceived you about the mercy of God.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنكُمْ فِدْيَةٌ وَلَا مِنَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ مَأْوَاكُمُ النَّارُ ۖ هِيَ مَوْلَاكُمْ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: So on this day no ransom will be accepted from you nor from the disbelievers. Your dwelling will be fire. It will be your friend and a terrible end".

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا كَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Is it not time for the hearts of the believers to become humbled by the remembrance of God and by the Truth which has been revealed so that they will not be like the followers of the Bible who lived before them and whose hearts have become hard like stone through the long years. Many of them are evil doers.

verses.content: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُحْيِي الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Know that God brings the dead earth back to life. We have explained Our revelations to you so that you may perhaps have understanding.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَالْمُصَّدِّقَاتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَاعَفُ لَهُمْ وَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: The charitable men and women who give a virtuous loan to God will receive double from Him in addition to their honorable reward.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصِّدِّيقُونَ ۖ وَالشُّهَدَاءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ وَنُورُهُمْ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Those who believe in God and His Messenger are the truthful ones and are witness (to the deeds of others) before their Lord. They will have their reward and their light. Those who disbelieve and reject Our revelations shall be the dwellers of hell.

verses.content: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ وَزِينَةٌ وَتَفَاخُرٌ بَيْنَكُمْ وَتَكَاثُرٌ فِي الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَوْلَادِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيْثٍ أَعْجَبَ الْكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَاهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَامًا ۖ وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانٌ ۚ وَمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا مَتَاعُ الْغُرُورِ
verses.translation: Know that the worldly life is only a game, a temporary attraction, a means of boastfulness among yourselves and a place for multiplying your wealth and children. It is like the rain which produces plants that are attractive to the unbelievers. These plants flourish, turn yellow, and then become crushed bits of straw. In the life hereafter there will be severe torment or forgiveness and mercy from God. The worldly life is only an illusion.

verses.content: سَابِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا كَعَرْضِ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ أُعِدَّتْ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ اللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Compete with one another to achieve forgiveness from your Lord and to reach Paradise, which is as vast as the heavens and the earth, and is prepared for those who believe in God and His Messenger. This is the blessing of God and He grants it to whomever He wants. The blessings of God are great.

verses.content: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي أَنفُسِكُمْ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّبْرَأَهَا ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: Whatever hardships you face on earth and in your souls were written in the Book before the creation of the souls. This is certainly easy for God

verses.content: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا بِمَا آتَاكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍ فَخُورٍ
verses.translation: so that you would not grieve over what you have lost nor become too happy about what God has granted to you. God does not love the arrogant boastful ones who are niggardly and who try to make other people also niggardly.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ النَّاسَ بِالْبُخْلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: Those who turn away (from guidance) should know that God is Self-sufficient and Praiseworthy.

verses.content: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَأَنزَلْنَا مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ وَالْمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ النَّاسُ بِالْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَنزَلْنَا الْحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأْسٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَنَافِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ اللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُ وَرُسُلَهُ بِالْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
verses.translation: We sent Our Messengers with clear evidence (to support their truthfulness), and sent with them the Book and the Balance so that people would maintain justice. We sent down iron - in which there is strong power and benefit for the people - so that God would know who would help Him and His Messenger without seeing the unseen. God is All-powerful and Majestic.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا النُّبُوَّةَ وَالْكِتَابَ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مُّهْتَدٍ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: We sent Noah and Abraham and placed prophethood and the Book among their offsprings, some of whom have the right guidance. However, most of them are evil doers.

verses.content: ثُمَّ قَفَّيْنَا عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيْنَا بِعِيسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْإِنجِيلَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِي قُلُوبِ الَّذِينَ اتَّبَعُوهُ رَأْفَةً وَرَحْمَةً وَرَهْبَانِيَّةً ابْتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبْنَاهَا عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ رِضْوَانِ اللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوْهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَا ۖ فَآتَيْنَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنْهُمْ أَجْرَهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then We sent Our other Messengers to follow their traditions. After them We sent Jesus, the son of Mary, to whom We gave the Gospel. In the hearts of his followers We placed compassion and mercy. We did not command them to lead the monastic life. This was their own method of seeking the pleasure of God. Despite this intention, they did not properly observe it (the monastic life). To the believers among them, We gave their reward but many of them are evil-doers.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَآمِنُوا بِرَسُولِهِ يُؤْتِكُمْ كِفْلَيْنِ مِن رَّحْمَتِهِ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ نُورًا تَمْشُونَ بِهِ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Believers, have fear of God and believe in His Messenger. God will grant you a double share of mercy, a light by which you can walk, and forgive your sins. God is All-forgiving and All-merciful.

verses.content: لِّئَلَّا يَعْلَمَ أَهْلُ الْكِتَابِ أَلَّا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ مِّن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ الْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ اللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: (Have fear of God and believe in His Messenger) so that the followers of the Bible will know that they can receive no reward from God. They should know that all favors are in the hands of God. He grants them to whomever He wants. The favors of God are great.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قَدْ سَمِعَ اللَّهُ قَوْلَ الَّتِي تُجَادِلُكَ فِي زَوْجِهَا وَتَشْتَكِي إِلَى اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ يَسْمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: God has certainly heard the words of the woman who disputed with you about her husband and who (after not having received a favorable response from you) complained to God. God was listening to your argument. He is All-hearing and All-aware.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُظَاهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَائِهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَاتِهِمْ ۖ إِنْ أُمَّهَاتُهُمْ إِلَّا اللَّائِي وَلَدْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرًا مِّنَ الْقَوْلِ وَزُورًا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: Those who renounce their wives by calling them mothers should know that their wives could never become their mothers. Their mothers are those who have given birth to them. The words that they speak are certainly detestable and sinful. But God is Pardoning and All-forgiving.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يُظَاهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَائِهِمْ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُوا فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَاسَّا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Those who renounce their wives by calling them mothers and then change their minds about what they have said will have to set free a slave as a ransom and only then will their carnal relations be lawful. This is what you have been commanded. God is Well Aware of whatever you do.

verses.content: فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَاسَّا ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَإِطْعَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسْكِينًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ ۗ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: If one cannot set free a slave, he must fast for two consecutive months, and only then can he have lawful carnal relations. If this is also not possible, he must feed sixty destitute people. This is the command of God, so that perhaps you will have faith in God and His Messenger. Such are the Laws of God, and those who disbelieve them will suffer a painful torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُحَادُّونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ كُبِتُوا كَمَا كُبِتَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ وَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَا آيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ ۚ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
verses.translation: Those who oppose God and His Messenger will be humiliated like those who lived before. We have sent illustrious revelations and those who disbelieve will suffer a humiliating torment.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا ۚ أَحْصَاهُ اللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: On the day when everyone will be resurrected, God will tell them about their deeds which He has recorded in their entirety - while they themselves have forgotten them. God is the witness over all things.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ مَا يَكُونُ مِن نَّجْوَىٰ ثَلَاثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمْ وَلَا خَمْسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمْ وَلَا أَدْنَىٰ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَا أَكْثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كَانُوا ۖ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Have you not considered that God knows all that is in the heavens and the earth? There is not a single place wherein any secret counsel can take place between any three people without God being the fourth, nor five people without His being the sixth nor any gathering of more or less people, wherever it may be, without His being with them. On the Day of Judgment, He will tell them about their deeds. God has the knowledge of all things.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ نُهُوا عَنِ النَّجْوَىٰ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُوا عَنْهُ وَيَتَنَاجَوْنَ بِالْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ الرَّسُولِ وَإِذَا جَاءُوكَ حَيَّوْكَ بِمَا لَمْ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ اللَّهُ وَيَقُولُونَ فِي أَنفُسِهِمْ لَوْلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا اللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُ ۚ حَسْبُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ يَصْلَوْنَهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Have you not seen those who have been forbidden to have secret counsels violate this prohibition and resume their secret counsels for sinful and hostile purposes and to disobey the Messenger? When they come to you (Muhammad), they greet you with a greeting with which even God has not greeted you and say to themselves, "Why has God not punished us for what we say (if he is a true Prophet)?" The heat of hell is a sufficient torment for them. This is the most terrible fate.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَنَاجَيْتُمْ فَلَا تَتَنَاجَوْا بِالْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ الرَّسُولِ وَتَنَاجَوْا بِالْبِرِّ وَالتَّقْوَىٰ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ الَّذِي إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.translation: Believers, when you hold a secret counsel, let it not be for a sinful, hostile purpose or to disobey the Messenger, but let your counsel take place for virtuous and pious reasons. Have fear of God in whose presence you will all be brought together.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا النَّجْوَىٰ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ لِيَحْزُنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَلَيْسَ بِضَارِّهِمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Holding secret counsels for (evil purposes) is a work of satan to cause grief to the believers, but he can do no harm to them except by the will of God. Let the believers trust in God.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمْ تَفَسَّحُوا فِي الْمَجَالِسِ فَافْسَحُوا يَفْسَحِ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا قِيلَ انشُزُوا فَانشُزُوا يَرْفَعِ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Believers, when you are told to make room in a meeting for others, do so. God will then make room for you. When you are told to disperse, do so. God will raise the position of the believers and of those who have received knowledge. God is Well-Aware of what you do.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا نَاجَيْتُمُ الرَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ نَجْوَاكُمْ صَدَقَةً ۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Believers, whenever you consult the Prophet, offer charity before your consultation. This will be better for you and more pure. However, if you do not find anything to give in charity, then God is All-forgiving and All-merciful.

verses.content: أَأَشْفَقْتُمْ أَن تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ نَجْوَاكُمْ صَدَقَاتٍ ۚ فَإِذْ لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا وَتَابَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ خَبِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Were you afraid that giving in charity before your consultation would make you poor? Since you did not offer such charity, God forgave you for this. At least be steadfast in prayer, pay the religious tax, and obey God and His Messenger. God is Well Aware of what you do.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوْا قَوْمًا غَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَا مِنْهُمْ وَيَحْلِفُونَ عَلَى الْكَذِبِ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Have you not seen those who have established friendship with the people who are subject to the wrath of God? They do not belong to you nor you to them, yet they knowingly try to prove their point by using false oaths.

verses.content: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ سَاءَ مَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: God has prepared a severe torment for them. What an evil deed they have committed!

verses.content: اتَّخَذُوا أَيْمَانَهُمْ جُنَّةً فَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
verses.translation: They have made their oaths as a shield to obstruct others from the way of God. They will suffer a humiliating torment.

verses.content: لَّن تُغْنِيَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَالُهُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُهُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ
verses.translation: Neither their wealth nor their children will be able to protect them against God. They will be the dwellers of hell fire wherein they will live forever.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا فَيَحْلِفُونَ لَهُ كَمَا يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ ۚ أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ الْكَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: On the day when God will resurrect them all together, they will swear to Him as they swore to you and they will think that they have a good case but they are certainly liars.

verses.content: اسْتَحْوَذَ عَلَيْهِمُ الشَّيْطَانُ فَأَنسَاهُمْ ذِكْرَ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ حِزْبُ الشَّيْطَانِ ۚ أَلَا إِنَّ حِزْبَ الشَّيْطَانِ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ
verses.translation: Satan has dominated them and has made them forget the guidance of God. They are Satan's party and the party of Satan will certainly suffer a great loss.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُحَادُّونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ أُولَـٰئِكَ فِي الْأَذَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Disgrace will strike those who oppose God and His Messenger.

verses.content: كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَأَغْلِبَنَّ أَنَا وَرُسُلِي ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
verses.translation: God has decreed, "I and My Messenger shall certainly triumph." God is All-powerful and Majestic.

verses.content: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوْمًا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ يُوَادُّونَ مَنْ حَادَّ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَلَوْ كَانُوا آبَاءَهُمْ أَوْ أَبْنَاءَهُمْ أَوْ إِخْوَانَهُمْ أَوْ عَشِيرَتَهُمْ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ كَتَبَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَأَيَّدَهُم بِرُوحٍ مِّنْهُ ۖ وَيُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ حِزْبُ اللَّهِ ۚ أَلَا إِنَّ حِزْبَ اللَّهِ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: You will not find any people of faith in God and the Day of Judgment who would establish friendship with those who oppose God and His Messenger, even if it would be in the interest of their fathers, sons, brothers, and kinsmen. God has established faith in their hearts and supported them by a Spirit from Himself. He will admit them to Paradise wherein streams flow to live therein forever. God is pleased with them and they are pleased with God. These are members of the party of God and the party of God will certainly have everlasting happiness.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: All that is in the heavens and the earth glorify God. He is the Majestic and All-wise.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ مِن دِيَارِهِمْ لِأَوَّلِ الْحَشْرِ ۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن يَخْرُجُوا ۖ وَظَنُّوا أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمْ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ فَأَتَاهُمُ اللَّهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَمْ يَحْتَسِبُوا ۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الرُّعْبَ ۚ يُخْرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَيْدِي الْمُؤْمِنِينَ فَاعْتَبِرُوا يَا أُولِي الْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: It is He who drove the disbelievers among the followers of the Bible out of their homes (in the Arabian Peninsula) as the first time exiles. You did not think that they would leave their homes and they thought that their fortresses would save them from God. The decree of God came upon them in a way that even they did not expect. He caused such terror to enter their hearts that they started to destroy their own homes by their own hands and by those of the believers. People of vision, learn from this a lesson.

verses.content: وَلَوْلَا أَن كَتَبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمُ الْجَلَاءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِي الْآخِرَةِ عَذَابُ النَّارِ
verses.translation: Had God not decreed exile for them, He would have certainly punished them (in some other way). In this life and in the next life they would have suffered the torment of hell fire.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ شَاقُّوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ ۖ وَمَن يُشَاقِّ اللَّهَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ
verses.translation: This is because they opposed God and His Messenger and whoever opposes God should know that God's retribution is severe.

verses.content: مَا قَطَعْتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوْ تَرَكْتُمُوهَا قَائِمَةً عَلَىٰ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَلِيُخْزِيَ الْفَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: All the productive palm-trees (of the Jews hostile to you) which you cut down or left untouched were the will of God to bring disgrace upon the evil-doers.

verses.content: وَمَا أَفَاءَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِ مِنْهُمْ فَمَا أَوْجَفْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ خَيْلٍ وَلَا رِكَابٍ وَلَـٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: Since you did not have to exhaust your horses and camels or (even fight), God granted to His Messenger their property. God gives authority to His Messenger over whomever He wants. God has power over all things.

verses.content: مَّا أَفَاءَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِ مِنْ أَهْلِ الْقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ وَابْنِ السَّبِيلِ كَيْ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةً بَيْنَ الْأَغْنِيَاءِ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَمَا آتَاكُمُ الرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَاكُمْ عَنْهُ فَانتَهُوا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ
verses.translation: Whatever God grants to His Messenger (out of the property) of the people of the towns, belongs to God, the Messenger, the kinsfolk, the orphans, the destitute and to those who may become needy while on a journey, so that it will not circulate only in the hands of rich ones among them. Take only what the Messenger gives to you and desist from what he forbids you. Have fear of God; God is severe in His retribution.

verses.content: لِلْفُقَرَاءِ الْمُهَاجِرِينَ الَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا مِن دِيَارِهِمْ وَأَمْوَالِهِمْ يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانًا وَيَنصُرُونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
verses.translation: The poor immigrants who were deprived of their homes and property, who seek favors and pleasures from God, and help Him and His Messenger will also have (a share in the said property). These people are the truthful ones.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُوا الدَّارَ وَالْإِيمَانَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ يُحِبُّونَ مَنْ هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمْ حَاجَةً مِّمَّا أُوتُوا وَيُؤْثِرُونَ عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَوْ كَانَ بِهِمْ خَصَاصَةٌ ۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: Those who established a community center and embraced the faith before the arrival of the immigrants love those who have come to their town. They are not jealous of what is given to the immigrants. They give preference to them over themselves - even concerning the things that they themselves urgently need. Whoever controls his greed will have everlasting happiness.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ جَاءُوا مِن بَعْدِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَانِنَا الَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِالْإِيمَانِ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلًّا لِّلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Those who migrated later (to Medina) say, "Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in the faith, and clear our hearts of any ill will against the believers. Lord, You are Compassionate and All-merciful".

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ نَافَقُوا يَقُولُونَ لِإِخْوَانِهِمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ لَئِنْ أُخْرِجْتُمْ لَنَخْرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمْ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمْ أَحَدًا أَبَدًا وَإِن قُوتِلْتُمْ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: Have you not seen the hypocrites who say to their disbelieving brothers among the People of the Book, "If you are driven out, we shall, also, leave the town with you and we shall never obey whoever seeks to harm you. If you are attacked, we shall help you." God testifies that they are liars.

verses.content: لَئِنْ أُخْرِجُوا لَا يَخْرُجُونَ مَعَهُمْ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُوا لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمْ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمْ لَيُوَلُّنَّ الْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: If they were to be expelled, they would not go with them. If they were to be attacked they would not help them. Even if they were to help them, they would run away from the battle and leave them helpless.

verses.content: لَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ رَهْبَةً فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
verses.translation: They are more afraid of you than of God. They are a people who lack understanding.

verses.content: لَا يُقَاتِلُونَكُمْ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِي قُرًى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوْ مِن وَرَاءِ جُدُرٍ ۚ بَأْسُهُم بَيْنَهُمْ شَدِيدٌ ۚ تَحْسَبُهُمْ جَمِيعًا وَقُلُوبُهُمْ شَتَّىٰ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: They will not fight you united except with the protection of fortified towns or from behind walls. They are strong among themselves. You think that they are united, but in fact, their hearts are divided. They are a people who have no understanding.

verses.content: كَمَثَلِ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَرِيبًا ۖ ذَاقُوا وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: They are like those who, a short time before, suffered the consequences of their deeds. They, too, will suffer a painful torment.

verses.content: كَمَثَلِ الشَّيْطَانِ إِذْ قَالَ لِلْإِنسَانِ اكْفُرْ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيءٌ مِّنكَ إِنِّي أَخَافُ اللَّهَ رَبَّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: They are like satan who said to people, "Reject the faith," but when the people rejected the faith he said, "I have nothing to do with you. I fear the Lord of the Universe".

verses.content: فَكَانَ عَاقِبَتَهُمَا أَنَّهُمَا فِي النَّارِ خَالِدَيْنِ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَاءُ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: The fate of both of them will be hell fire wherein they will live forever. Thus will be the recompense for the unjust.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَلْتَنظُرْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ لِغَدٍ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ خَبِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Believers, have fear of God. A soul must see what it has done for the future. Have fear of God for He is All-aware of what you do.

verses.content: وَلَا تَكُونُوا كَالَّذِينَ نَسُوا اللَّهَ فَأَنسَاهُمْ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْفَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Do not be like those who forget about God. He will make them forget themselves. These are the sinful people.

verses.content: لَا يَسْتَوِي أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ وَأَصْحَابُ الْجَنَّةِ ۚ أَصْحَابُ الْجَنَّةِ هُمُ الْفَائِزُونَ
verses.translation: The Companions of the Fire and the Companions of the Garden are not equal. The Companions of the Garden will achieve felicity.

verses.content: لَوْ أَنزَلْنَا هَـٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٍ لَّرَأَيْتَهُ خَاشِعًا مُّتَصَدِّعًا مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَتِلْكَ الْأَمْثَالُ نَضْرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: The people of Paradise and hell are not alike; the people of Paradise are the successful ones. Had We sent down this Quran on a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and rent asunder for fear of God. These are parables which We tell to people so that perhaps they will think.

verses.content: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ ۖ هُوَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: He is God, the only Lord, Who knows the unseen and the seen. He is the Beneficent and All-merciful One.

verses.content: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: He is the only Lord, the King, the Holy, the Peace, the Forgiver, the Watchful Guardian, the Majestic, the Dominant, and the Exalted. God is too exalted to have any partner.

verses.content: هُوَ اللَّهُ الْخَالِقُ الْبَارِئُ الْمُصَوِّرُ ۖ لَهُ الْأَسْمَاءُ الْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: He is the Creator, the Designer, the Modeler, and to Him belong all virtuous names. All that is in the heavens and the earth glorify Him. He is All-majestic and All-wise.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَتَّخِذُوا عَدُوِّي وَعَدُوَّكُمْ أَوْلِيَاءَ تُلْقُونَ إِلَيْهِم بِالْمَوَدَّةِ وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا بِمَا جَاءَكُم مِّنَ الْحَقِّ يُخْرِجُونَ الرَّسُولَ وَإِيَّاكُمْ ۙ أَن تُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ رَبِّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ خَرَجْتُمْ جِهَادًا فِي سَبِيلِي وَابْتِغَاءَ مَرْضَاتِي ۚ تُسِرُّونَ إِلَيْهِم بِالْمَوَدَّةِ وَأَنَا أَعْلَمُ بِمَا أَخْفَيْتُمْ وَمَا أَعْلَنتُمْ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْهُ مِنكُمْ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَاءَ السَّبِيلِ
verses.translation: Believers, do not choose My enemies and your own enemies for friends, and offer them strong love. They have rejected the Truth which has come to you, and have expelled the Messenger and you from your homes because of your belief in your Lord. When you go to fight for My cause and seek My pleasure, you secretly express your love of them. I know best what you reveal or conceal. Whichever of you does this has indeed gone astray from the right path.

verses.content: إِن يَثْقَفُوكُمْ يَكُونُوا لَكُمْ أَعْدَاءً وَيَبْسُطُوا إِلَيْكُمْ أَيْدِيَهُمْ وَأَلْسِنَتَهُم بِالسُّوءِ وَوَدُّوا لَوْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: If they find an opportunity to turn against you, they will become your enemies and will stretch out their hands and tongues at you with evil intent. They would love to see you turn away from your faith.

verses.content: لَن تَنفَعَكُمْ أَرْحَامُكُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُكُمْ ۚ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: Your relatives and children will never be of any benefit to you on the Day of Judgment. God will separate you from them. He is All-aware of what you do.

verses.content: قَدْ كَانَتْ لَكُمْ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ فِي إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ إِذْ قَالُوا لِقَوْمِهِمْ إِنَّا بُرَآءُ مِنكُمْ وَمِمَّا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَفَرْنَا بِكُمْ وَبَدَا بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمُ الْعَدَاوَةُ وَالْبَغْضَاءُ أَبَدًا حَتَّىٰ تُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَحْدَهُ إِلَّا قَوْلَ إِبْرَاهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ لَأَسْتَغْفِرَنَّ لَكَ وَمَا أَمْلِكُ لَكَ مِنَ اللَّهِ مِن شَيْءٍ ۖ رَّبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Abraham and those with him are the best examples for you to follow. They told the people, "We have nothing to do with you and with those whom you worship besides God. We have rejected you. Enmity and hatred will separate us forever unless you believe in One God." Abraham told his father, "I shall ask forgiveness for you only, but I shall not be of the least help to you before God".

verses.content: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا رَبَّنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: They prayed, "Lord, we have trust in You, turned to You in repentance, and to You we shall all return. Lord, save us from the evil intentions of the disbelievers. Our Lord, forgives us. You are Majestic and All-wise".

verses.content: لَقَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فِيهِمْ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرْجُو اللَّهَ وَالْيَوْمَ الْآخِرَ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: They are the best examples for those who have hope in God and the Day of Judgment. Whoever turn away should know that God is Self-sufficient and Praiseworthy.

verses.content: عَسَى اللَّهُ أَن يَجْعَلَ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَ الَّذِينَ عَادَيْتُم مِّنْهُم مَّوَدَّةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ قَدِيرٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: God will perhaps bring about love between you and those of the disbelievers with whom you were enemies. God is All-powerful, All-merciful, and All-forgiving.

verses.content: لَّا يَنْهَاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ لَمْ يُقَاتِلُوكُمْ فِي الدِّينِ وَلَمْ يُخْرِجُوكُم مِّن دِيَارِكُمْ أَن تَبَرُّوهُمْ وَتُقْسِطُوا إِلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.translation: God does not forbid you to deal kindly and justly with those who have not fought against you about the religion or expelled you from your homes. God does not love the unjust people.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا يَنْهَاكُمُ اللَّهُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ قَاتَلُوكُمْ فِي الدِّينِ وَأَخْرَجُوكُم مِّن دِيَارِكُمْ وَظَاهَرُوا عَلَىٰ إِخْرَاجِكُمْ أَن تَوَلَّوْهُمْ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُمْ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.translation: He only forbids you to be friends with those who have fought against you about the religion, expelled you from your homes or supported others in expelling you. Whoever loves these people are unjust.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا جَاءَكُمُ الْمُؤْمِنَاتُ مُهَاجِرَاتٍ فَامْتَحِنُوهُنَّ ۖ اللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِإِيمَانِهِنَّ ۖ فَإِنْ عَلِمْتُمُوهُنَّ مُؤْمِنَاتٍ فَلَا تَرْجِعُوهُنَّ إِلَى الْكُفَّارِ ۖ لَا هُنَّ حِلٌّ لَّهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحِلُّونَ لَهُنَّ ۖ وَآتُوهُم مَّا أَنفَقُوا ۚ وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ أَن تَنكِحُوهُنَّ إِذَا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ ۚ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوا بِعِصَمِ الْكَوَافِرِ وَاسْأَلُوا مَا أَنفَقْتُمْ وَلْيَسْأَلُوا مَا أَنفَقُوا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ حُكْمُ اللَّهِ ۖ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: Believers, when believing immigrant women come to you, test them. God knows best about their faith. If you know that they are believers, do not return them to the disbelievers. Such women are not lawful for them and disbelievers are not lawful for such women. Give the disbelievers whatever they have spent (on such women for their dowry). There is no offense for you to marry them if you agree to give them their dowry. Do not hold unto your disbelieving wives; you may get back what you have spent on them for their dowry and the disbelievers may also ask for what they have spent. This is the command of God by which He judges you. God is All-knowing and All-wise.

verses.content: وَإِن فَاتَكُمْ شَيْءٌ مِّنْ أَزْوَاجِكُمْ إِلَى الْكُفَّارِ فَعَاقَبْتُمْ فَآتُوا الَّذِينَ ذَهَبَتْ أَزْوَاجُهُم مِّثْلَ مَا أَنفَقُوا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ الَّذِي أَنتُم بِهِ مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: If your wives go away from you to disbelievers who will not give you back the dowry which you spent on them, let the Muslims pay back such dowry from the property of the disbelievers which may come into their hands. Have fear of God in whom you believe.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِذَا جَاءَكَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتُ يُبَايِعْنَكَ عَلَىٰ أَن لَّا يُشْرِكْنَ بِاللَّهِ شَيْئًا وَلَا يَسْرِقْنَ وَلَا يَزْنِينَ وَلَا يَقْتُلْنَ أَوْلَادَهُنَّ وَلَا يَأْتِينَ بِبُهْتَانٍ يَفْتَرِينَهُ بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِنَّ وَأَرْجُلِهِنَّ وَلَا يَعْصِينَكَ فِي مَعْرُوفٍ ۙ فَبَايِعْهُنَّ وَاسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُنَّ اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Prophet, when believing women come to you pledging not to consider anything equal to God, not to steal, or to commit fornication, not to kill their children, or to bring false charges against anyone (such as ascribing others children to their husbands), and not to disobey you in lawful matters, accept their pledge, and ask forgiveness for them from God. God is All-forgiving and All-merciful.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَتَوَلَّوْا قَوْمًا غَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ قَدْ يَئِسُوا مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ كَمَا يَئِسَ الْكُفَّارُ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Believers, do not establish friendship with the people who have become subject to the wrath of God. They do not have any hope in the life to come, just as the disbelievers have no hope in those who are in their graves.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: All that is in the heavens and the earth glorify God. He is the Majestic and All-wise.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Believers, why do you preach what you do not practice?

verses.content: كَبُرَ مَقْتًا عِندَ اللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُوا مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: It is most hateful in the sight of God if you say something and do not practice it.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الَّذِينَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِهِ صَفًّا كَأَنَّهُم بُنْيَانٌ مَّرْصُوصٌ
verses.translation: God loves those who fight for His cause in battlefield formations firm as an unbreakable concrete wall.

verses.content: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ يَا قَوْمِ لِمَ تُؤْذُونَنِي وَقَد تَّعْلَمُونَ أَنِّي رَسُولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا زَاغُوا أَزَاغَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْفَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: Moses said to his people, "Why do you create difficulties for me when you know that I am God's Messenger to you?" When they deviated (from the right path), God led their hearts astray. God does not guide the evil-doing people.

verses.content: وَإِذْ قَالَ عِيسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ إِنِّي رَسُولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيْكُم مُّصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيَّ مِنَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَمُبَشِّرًا بِرَسُولٍ يَأْتِي مِن بَعْدِي اسْمُهُ أَحْمَدُ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ قَالُوا هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Jesus, son of Mary, said to the Israelites, "I am the Messenger of God sent to you. I confirm the Torah which is in existence and give you the glad news of the coming of a Messenger who will come after me named Ahmad." When this Messenger came to them with all the proofs (to support his truthfulness), they said, "He is simply a magician".

verses.content: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرَىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ الْكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدْعَىٰ إِلَى الْإِسْلَامِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: Who is more unjust than one who creates falsehood against God when he has already been invited to Islam? God does not guide the unjust people.

verses.content: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطْفِئُوا نُورَ اللَّهِ بِأَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَاللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْكَافِرُونَ
