verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: until death approached us".

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: The intercession of the intercessors will be of no benefit to them.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: If such will be the Day of Judgment, what is the matter with them? Why do they run away from guidance,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: like frightened donkeys

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: running away from a lion?

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Is it that everyone of them wants to receive a heavenly book addressed to him personally?

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: This will certainly never be the case! In fact, they are not afraid of the Day of Judgment.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: There is no doubt that the Quran is a guide.

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: Let anyone who seeks guidance do so.

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: No one will seek guidance unless God wills it. He alone is worthy of being feared and He is the Source of Forgiveness.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: and by the self accusing soul (that you will certainly be resurrected).

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: Do men think that We shall never be able to assemble their bones?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: We certainly have the power to restore them even the very tips of their finger.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: In fact, people want to have eternal life in this world.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: He asks, "When will be the Day of Judgment?"

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: When the eye is bewildered,

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: the moon eclipsed.

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: and the sun and the moon are brought together,

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: people will say, "Is there anywhere to run away?"

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: Certainly not! There will be no place of refuge.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: The only place of refuge will be with God.

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: On that day, people will be informed of all that they had done and all that they were supposed to do.

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: In fact, people are well-aware of their own soul

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: even though they make excuses.

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), do not move your tongue too quickly to recite the Quran.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: We shall be responsible for its collection and its recitation.

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: When We recite it, follow its recitation (by Us).

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: We shall be responsible for its explanation.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: Human beings certainly do not want to pay much attention to the Quran. In fact, they love the worldly life

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: and neglect the life to come.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: On the Day of Judgment some faces will be bright,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: and look forward to receiving mercy from their Lord.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Others will be despondent,

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: certain of facing a great calamity.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: Some people, certainly, do not believe in it, but when a person's soul reaches up to his throat

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: and the angels say, "Who will take away his soul,

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: (the angels of mercy or the angels of wrath,)" then, he will realize that it is time to leave this world.

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: When legs are twisted around each other,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: that will be the time to be driven to one's Lord.

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: The human being does not want to believe the Truth, nor does he want to pray.

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He rejects the faith, turns away

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: and haughtily goes to his people.

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe to you!

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe to you!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: For you, the human being of such behavior, will certainly deserve it.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Does the human being think that he will be left uncontrolled?

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not once just a drop of discharged sperm.

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not turned into a clot of blood? God then formed him and gave him proper shape. From the human being, God made males and females in pairs.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Does He then not have the power to bring the dead back to life?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: There was certainly a time when there was no mention of the human being.

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: We created the human being from the union of sperm and egg to test him. We gave him hearing and vision.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: We showed him the right path whether he would be grateful or ungrateful.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: We have prepared chains, shackles, and flaming fire (for the disbelievers).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: The virtuous ones will drink from a cup containing camphor

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: which flows from a spring from which the servants of God will drink.

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: The servants of God fulfill their vows and are afraid of the day in which there will be widespread terror.

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: They feed the destitute, orphans, and captives for the love of God, saying,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: "We only feed you for the sake of God and we do not want any reward or thanks from you.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: We are afraid of our Lord and the bitterly distressful day".

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: God will certainly rescue them from the terror of that day and will meet them with joy and pleasure.

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: For their patience, He will reward them with Paradise and silk.

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: They will recline therein on couches and they will find neither excessive heat nor cold.

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: The shades of the garden will be closely spread over them and it will be easy for them to reach the fruits.

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: They will be served with silver dishes and crystal clear goblets.

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Also there will be crystal clear goblets of silver containing the exact measure of drink which they desire.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: They will drink cups containing (soft flowing) sparkling water

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: from a spring named salsabil.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: They will be served by immortal youths who look like scattered pearls.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: If you were to see it, you would find it to be a great kingdom with great bounty.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: They will have fine green silk and brocade, and they will be decked with bracelets of silver. Their Lord will provide them with a drink of pure wine.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: This will be their reward and their efforts will be appreciated.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: (Muhammad), We have revealed the Quran to you in gradual steps.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: So wait patiently for the command of your Lord and do not yield to any sinful or disbelieving person among them (people).

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: Mention the Name of your Lord, mornings and evenings.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: Prostrate before Him and glorify Him extensively during the night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: These people (disbelievers) love the worldly life and neglect the terrifying day which will come.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We have created them and have given them strength. Had We wanted, We could have replaced them with another people like them.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This chapter is a reminder. Let those who want, seek guidance from their Lord.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: (The virtuous mentioned in this chapter) want only what God wants. God is All-knowing and All-wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He admits to His mercy whomever He wants. For the unjust He has prepared a painful punishment.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By (the angels) sent forth with the commands of God,

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: by (the angels) as swift as blowing winds,

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: by (the angels) spreading (the words of God) far and wide,

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: by (the angels) who make a clear distinction between right and wrong

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: and by those who reveal revelations (to the prophets)

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: to provide excuses for some and to give warnings to others:

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: that whatever with which you have been warned will inevitably come to pass.

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: Then the stars will lose their light.

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: Heavens will rent asunder.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: The mountains will be blown away as dust.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: The Messengers will receive their appointments.

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: If one asks, "To which day have such calamitous events been postponed?"

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: one will be told,"To the Day of Distinction".

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: Would that you knew about the Day of Judgment!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe will be to those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the ancient people

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and make others settle after them in their land?

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus do We deal with the sinful ones.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from an insignificant drop of fluid

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: and place it in a secure place

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: for an appointed time?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: Thus did We Plan and how excellent is Our planning!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected the revelations of God!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Did We not make the earth as a gathering place

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: for the living and the dead,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: place on it high mountains and provide you with fresh water?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that Day (of Judgment) woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Proceed to that (the Day of Judgment) which you have rejected.

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Proceed to that shadow, rising in three columns

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: which neither gives shade nor protects one from the flames.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: The fire will shoot out sparks as big as huge towers

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: and yellow camels.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: On that day they will not be able to speak,

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: nor will they be permitted to offer any excuses.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: That is the Day of Judgment. We will bring you together with all the ancient peoples.

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: If you have any plans, use them.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: The pious ones will rest amid the shade, springs,

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and fruits of the kind which they desire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: (They will be told), "Eat and drink in good health as a reward for what you have done".

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus do We reward the righteous ones.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: (Disbelievers), eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while. You are certainly sinful ones.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: When they are told to say their prayers, they do not bow down (in prayer).

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: In which word other than the Quran will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: What do they quarrel about?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: They quarrel about the great news

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: concerning which they have disputes.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: (What they think is certainly despicable!). They will soon come to know (the reality).

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Yes, indeed, before long they will learn all about it.

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth as a place to rest

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: and the mountains as pegs (to anchor the earth)?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: Have We not created you in pairs,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: made sleep for you to rest,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: made the night as a covering,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: and the day as time for you to make a living?

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made seven strong heavens above you,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: (the sun) as a shining torch

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: and sent down heavy rains from the clouds

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: to make the seeds, plants,

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: and thick gardens grow?

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: The Day of Judgment will certainly be the final appointment.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: On that day the trumpet will be sounded and you will come (to Us) in huge groups.

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: The heavens will have openings like doors.

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: The mountains will be driven away and become like mirages.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Hell will lie in wait (for its prey).

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: It will be a place of return

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: for the rebellious ones and they will live therein for ages.

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will not feel cold nor taste any drink

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: except boiling water and pus,

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: as a fitting recompense for their deeds.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: They did not expect such a Judgment

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: and persistently rejected Our revelations.

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: However, We have recorded everything in a book.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: (They will be told), "Suffer, We shall only increase the torment for you".

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: The pious ones will be triumphant.

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: They will have gardens and vineyards,

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: maidens with pears-shaped breasts who are of equal age (to their spouses)

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: and cups full of wine.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: They will not hear therein any unnecessary words or lies.

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: This will be their reward from your Lord, a favor from Him and a recompense for their deeds.

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them. He is the Beneficent God and no one will be able to address Him.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: On that day, the Spirit and the angels who stand in lines will not speak except those whom the Beneficent God has permitted, and he will speak the right words.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That will be the Day of the Truth. So let those who want seek refuge from their Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: We have warned you of the approaching torment. On that day, a person will see what his hands have committed. A disbeliever will say, "Would that I had been dust".

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By the angels who violently tear-out the souls of the disbelievers from their bodies,

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: by the angels who gently release the souls of the believers,

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: by the angels who float (in the heavens by the will of God),

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: by the angels who hasten along

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: and by the angels who regulate the affairs, (you will certainly be resurrected).

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the day when the first trumpet sound blasts

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: and will be followed by the second one,

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: hearts will undergo terrible trembling,

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: and eyes will be humbly cast down.

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: (The disbelievers) say, "Shall we be brought back to life again

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: after we have become bones and dust?"

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They have said, "Such a resurrection will certainly be a great loss".

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: However, it will only take a single blast

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: to bring them out of their graves and back to life on the earth's surface.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), have you heard the story of Moses

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: when his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa,

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: saying, "Go to the Pharaoh. He has transgressed beyond all bounds.

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say to him, "Would you like to reform yourself?

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: I shall guide you to your Lord so that you may perhaps have fear of Him".

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Moses showed him the great miracle

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: but the Pharaoh rejected it and disobeyed (Moses).

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he turned away in a hurry,

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: and gathered his people together

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: saying, "I am your supreme lord".

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: So God struck him with the torment of this life and the life hereafter.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: In this there is a lesson for those who have fear of God.

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: (People), is your creation harder for God than that of the heavens, which He created, raised and established

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: high above?

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: He has made its nights dark and its days bright.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: After this, He spread out the earth,

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: produced water and grass therefrom,

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: then set-up firmly the mountains.

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: All this was done as a means of enjoyment for you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: On the day when the great calamity comes,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: the human being will recall whatever he has done.

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Hell fire will become visible for those who would see it.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who have rebelled

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: and preferred the worldly life,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: hell will be their dwelling.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: However, those who had feared their Lord and restrained their souls from acting according to its desires.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Paradise will be the dwelling.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: (Muhammad), they ask you, "When will the Hour of Doom come?"

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: (Muhammad), you do not know (when and how) it will come.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: This matter is in the hands of your Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: You are only a warner for those who fear such a day.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: On the day when they see it, it will seem to them as though they had only lived in the world for a morning and an afternoon.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He frowned and then turned away

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: from a blind man who had come up to him.

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: You never know. Perhaps he wanted to purify himself,

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: or receive some (Quranic) advice which would benefit him.

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Yet you pay attention

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: to a rich man,

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: though you will not be questioned even if he never purifies himself.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: As for the one who comes to you earnestly (striving for guidance).

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and who has fear of God,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: you ignore him.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: These verses are a reminder

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: so let those who want to follow its guidance do so.

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: (This Quran) is also recorded in honorable books,

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: exalted, purified,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: by the hands of the noble, virtuous,

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: and angelic scribes.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: May (the disbelieving) human being be condemned! What makes him disbelieve?

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: From what has God created him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: He created him from a living germ. He determined his fate

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: and made the path of guidance easy for him to follow.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then He caused him to die and be buried

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: and He will resurrect him whenever He wants.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: Certainly, he has not duly fulfilled His commands.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Let the human being think about (how We produce) his food.

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: We send down abundant water,

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: and let the earth to break open

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: to yield therein corn,

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: grapes, vegetables,

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: olives, dates,

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: thickly planted gardens,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: fruits, and grass.

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: (These are made so as to be) means of enjoyment for you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: When the trumpet sounds,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: it will be such a day when a person will run away from his brother,

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: mother, father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: wife and sons,

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: for on that day everyone will be completely engrossed in his own concerns.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces on that day will be radiant,

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: laughing and joyous

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: but others will be gloomy

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: and covered by darkness.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: These will be the faces of the sinful disbelievers.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: (On the day) when the sun is made to cease shining,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: the stars are made to fade away,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: the mountains are scattered about as dust,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: the young barren camels are abandoned,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: the wild beasts are herded together,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: the oceans are brought to a boil,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: souls are reunited with their bodies,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: questions are asked about the baby girls buried alive,

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: such as, "For what crime were they murdered?"

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: the records of deeds are made public,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: the heavens are unveiled,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: hell is made to blaze,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: and Paradise is brought near,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: then every soul will discover the consequence of its deeds.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: I do not need to swear by the orbiting

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: stars which are visible during the night

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: and sit during the day, or by the darkening night

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: and brightening morning,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: that the Quran is the word of the honorable angelic, mighty Messenger

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: who is honored in the presence of the Lord of the Throne,

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: obeyed by (all creatures) and faithful to His trust.

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Your companion (Muhammad) does not suffer from any mental illness

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: He certainly saw him (Gabriel) high up on the horizon in his original form

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: He (Muhammad) is not accused of lying about the unseen.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: The Quran is not the word of condemned satan.

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: Where then will you go?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: This is certainly the guidance for all (jinn and mankind).

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: So let those who want, choose the right guidance

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: However, you will not be able to choose anything unless God, Lord of the Universe wills it to be so.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the heavens are rent asunder,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: the stars are dispersed,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: the oceans are merged together,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: and the graves are turned inside out,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: every soul will see the result of its deeds - those recorded before his death and those which will produce either virtue or evil after his death.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: Human being, what evil has deceived you about your Gracious Lord,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: Who created you proportionately and fashioned you

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: in whatever composition He wanted.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Despite this, you deny the Day of Judgment,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: but you should know that there are angelic guards

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: watching over you

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: and these honorable scribes know whatever you do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: The virtuous ones will live in bliss

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: and the evil-doers will be in hell

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: which they will enter on the Day of Judgment

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: to burn therein.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will never be able to escape from it. Would that you knew what the Day of Judgment is!

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again would that you only knew how terrible it really is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: On that day, no soul will be of any benefit to any other soul. On that day, all affairs will be in the hands of God.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to those who are fraudulent in (weighing and measuring),

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: those who demand a full measure from others

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: but when they measure or weigh, give less.

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not realize that they will be resurrected

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: on a great day

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: when mankind will stand before the Lord of the Universe?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: Woe to them! Let them know that the records of the sinner's deeds are in Sijin.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what Sijin is!?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: It is a comprehensively written Book (of records).

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, on that day, to those who have rejected God's revelations

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: and those who have rejected the Day of Judgment.

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: No one rejects it except the sinful transgressors

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: who, when listening to Our revelations, say, "These are only ancient legends".

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: They will never have faith. In fact, their hearts are stained from their deeds.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: On the Day of Judgment, they will certainly be barred from the mercy of their Lord.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They will suffer the heat of fire

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: and who will be told, "This is what you had called a lie".

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: However, the records of the deeds of the virtuous ones will certainly be in Illiyin.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what Illiyin is!

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: It is a comprehensively written Book (of records).

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: The ones nearest to God will bring it to public.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: The virtuous will live in bliss,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: reclining on couches, reviewing (the bounties given to them).

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: You can trace on their faces the joy of their bliss.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given pure wine out of sealed containers

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: which have the fragrance of musk. This is the kind of place for which one should really aspire.

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: With the wine is a drink from Tasnim,

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: a spring, the nearest ones to God will drink from it.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: The sinners had been laughing at the believers.

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: When passing by them, they would wink at one another

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: and, on returning to their people, boast about what they had done.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: On seeing the believers, they would say, "These people have gone astray".

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: No one has appointed them to watch over the believers.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: On the Day of Judgment, the believers will laugh at the disbelievers

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: while reclining on couches and reviewing (the bounties given to them).

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Will not the disbelievers then be duly recompensed for their laughing at the believers?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the heavens are rent asunder

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: in obedience to the commands of their Lord which are incumbent on them,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: when the earth is stretched out

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: and throws out of itself all that it contains

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: in obedience to the commands of its Lord which are incumbent on it, (the human being will receive due recompense for his deeds).

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: Human being, you strive hard to get closer to your Lord, and so you will certainly receive the recompense (of your deeds).

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: The reckoning of those whose Book of records will be given into their right hands

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: will be easy,

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: and they will return to their people, delighted

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: But as for those whose Book of records will be given behind their backs,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: they will say, "Woe to us!"

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: They will suffer the heat of hell fire.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: They lived among their people joyfully

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: and had thought that they would never be brought back to life again.

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: This is a fact. Their Lord is Well-Aware of (all that they do).

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: I do not need to swear by the sunset,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: or by the night in which things all come together to rest,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: or by the moon when it is full,

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: that you will certainly pass through one stage after another.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with them? Why do they not believe?

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: Why, when the Quran is recited to them, do they not prostrate themselves?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: In fact, they reject the Quran,

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: but God knows best whatever they accumulate in their hearts.

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), tell them that they will all suffer a painful torment

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: except the righteously striving believers, who will receive a never-ending reward.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the heavens with constellations,

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: by the promised day,

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: and by the witness (Muhammad) and that which is witnessed (the Day of Judgment),

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: may the people be condemned those who tortured (the believers) in ditches

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: by a burning fire

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: while they themselves sat around it

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: witnessing what they were doing.

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: The only reason for which they tormented the believers was the latter's belief in God, the Majestic, and Praiseworthy.

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: and the One to whom belongs the heavens and the earth. God is the Witness of all things.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Those who persecute the believing men and women without repenting will suffer the torment of hell and that of the burning fire.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: As for the righteously striving believers, they will live in Paradise wherein streams flow. This is the greatest triumph.

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: The vengeance of God is terribly severe.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: It is He who creates all things and causes them to return.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: He is the All-forgiving, the Most Loving One,

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: the Owner of the Throne, the Glorious One,

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: and the Most Effective in His decision.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Have you not heard about the stories of the armies

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: of the Pharaoh and Thamud?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: In fact, the disbelievers had always rejected (Our revelations).

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: However, God encompassed their activities.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: What is revealed to you is certainly a glorious Quran

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: that exists in a well-guarded tablet.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the heavens and al-tariq.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: Do you know what al-tariq is?

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: (It is a nightly radiant star).

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: There is no soul which is not guarded (by the two angels who record all of its deeds).

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: Let the human being reflect that from what he has been created.

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: He has been created from an ejected drop of fluid

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: which comes out of the loins and ribs.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: God has all power to resurrect him.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: On the day when all secrets will be made public,

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: he will have no power, nor anyone to help him.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the rotating heavens

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: and the replenishing earth,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: the Quran is the final word,

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: and it is certainly not a jest.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: They (disbelievers) plot every evil plan,

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: but I too plan against them.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: Give respite to the disbelievers and leave them alone for a while.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: (Muhammad), glorify the Name of your lord, the Most High,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who has created (all things) proportionately,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: decreed their destinies, and provided them with guidance.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: It is He who has caused the grass to grow,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: then caused it to wither away.

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall teach you (the Quran) and you will not forget it

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: unless God wills it to be otherwise. He knows all that is made public and all that remains hidden.

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall make all your tasks easy.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Therefore, keep on preaching as long as it is of benefit.

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who have fear of God will benefit

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: but the reprobates will turn away

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and suffer the heat of the great fire

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: wherein they will neither live nor die.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Lasting happiness will be for those who purify themselves,

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: remember the name of the Lord, and pray to Him.

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: However, (the disbelievers) prefer the worldly life

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: even though the life hereafter will be better and will last forever.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: This is what is written in the ancient heavenly Books,

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Have you heard the story of the overwhelming event (the Day of Judgment)?

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: On that day the faces of some people will be humbly cast down,

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: troubled and tired as a result of their deeds in the past.

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: They will suffer the heat of the blazing fire

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: and will be made to drink from a fiercely boiling spring.

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: They will have no food other than bitter and thorny fruit

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: which will neither fatten them nor satisfy them.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: However, on that day the faces of other people will be happy.

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: and pleased with the result of their deeds in the past.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: They will live in an exalted garden

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: wherein they will not hear any vain talk.

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Therein will be a flowing spring,

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: raised couches,

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: well arranged goblets,

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: well-placed cushions,

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: and well spread carpets.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: Have they not looked at how the camel is created,

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: how the heavens are raised up high,

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: how the mountains are set firm,

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: and how the earth is spread out?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), preach; you are only a preacher.

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: You do not have full control over them.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: However, those who turn away and disbelieve,

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: God will punish them with the greatest torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: To Us they will all return.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: In Our hands are their accounts.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the dawn,

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: by the Ten (secret) Nights,

verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: by the odd and even (8th and 9th Dhil-hajj)

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: and by the night when it moves on towards daybreak (reward and retribution in the next life is an absolute reality).

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Is this not a sufficient oath for intelligent people?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), consider how your Lord dealt with the tribe of Ad,

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: the people of the huge columned city of Eram

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: whose like has never been created in any other land.

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: (Also consider how He dealt with) the Thamud, who carved their houses out of the rocks in the valley.

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: (Also consider the people of) the Pharaoh who victimized people by placing them on the stake,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: led rebellious lives,

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: and spread much corruption in the land.

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Thus, your Lord afflicted them with torment;

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: your Lord keeps an eye on (all evil-doing people).

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: As for the human being, when his Lord tests him, honors him, and grants him bounty, he says, "God has honored me".

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: However, when his Lord tests him by a measured amount of sustenance, he says, "God has disgraced me".

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: (Since wealth does not necessarily guarantee everlasting happiness) then why do you not show kindness to the orphans,

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: or urge one another to feed the destitute?

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: Why do you take away the inheritance of others indiscriminately

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: and why do you have an excessive love of riches?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: When the earth is crushed into small pieces

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: and (when you find yourself) in the presence of your Lord and the rows and rows of angels, your greed for riches will certainly be of no avail to you.

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: On that day, hell will be brought closer and the human being will come to his senses, but this will be of no avail to him.

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say, "Would that I had done some good deeds for this life".

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: On that day the punishment of God and His detention will be unparalleled.

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: And His bonds will be such as none other can bind.

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: Serene soul,

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: return to your Lord well pleased with him and He will be pleased with you.

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: Enter among My servants

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: into My Paradise.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: I do not (need to) swear by this town (Mecca)

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: in which you are now living

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: or by the great father and his wonderful son (Abraham and Ishmael)

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: that We have created the human being to face a great deal of hardship.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does He think that no one will ever have control over him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: (He boasts and shows off) saying, "I have spent a great deal of money (for the cause of God)".

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that no one has seen him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not given him two eyes,

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: a tongue, and two lips?

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not shown him the ways of good and evil?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: Yet, he has not entered into Aqaba

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what Aqaba is!

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: It is the setting free of a slave

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: or, in a day of famine, the feeding of

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: an orphaned relative

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: and downtrodden destitute person, (so that he would be of)

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: the believers who cooperate with others in patience (steadfastness) and kindness.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: These are the people of the right hand.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: As for those who disbelieve in Our revelations, they are the people of the left

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: who will be engulfed in the fire.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and its noon-time brightness,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: by the moon when it follows the sun,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: by the day when it brightens the earth,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: by the night when it covers the earth with darkness,

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: by the heavens and that (Power) which established them,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: by the earth and that (Power) which spread it out

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: and by the soul and that (Power) which designed it

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: and inspired it with knowledge of evil and piety,

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: those who purify their souls will certainly have everlasting happiness

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: and those who corrupt their souls will certainly be deprived (of happiness).

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: The people of Thamud rejected (the truth) as a result of their rebelliousness

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: when the most corrupt of them incited them (to commit evil).

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: The Messenger of God told them, "This is a she-camel, belonging to God. Do not deprive her of her share of water".

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: However, they rejected him and slew her. So their Lord completely destroyed them and their city for their sins.

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: God is not afraid of the result of what He had decreed.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night when it covers the day,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: by the day when it appears radiant,

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and by that (Power) which created the male and female,

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: you strive in various ways.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall facilitate the path to bliss

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: for those who spend for the cause of God,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: observe piety, and believe in receiving rewards from God.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But for those who are niggardly, horde their wealth,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and have no faith in receiving any reward (from God).

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall facilitate the path to affliction

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: and their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they face destruction.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely, in Our hands is guidance,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: and to Us belong the hereafter and the worldly life.

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: I have warned you about the fierce blazing fire

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: in which no one will suffer forever

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: except the wicked ones who have rejected the (Truth) and have turned away from it.

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: The pious ones who spend for the cause of God

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: and purify themselves will be safe from this fire.

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: They do not expect any reward

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: except the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: and the reward (of their Lord) will certainly make them happy.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the midday brightness

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: and by the calm of night,

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), your Lord has not abandoned you (by not sending you His revelation), nor is He displeased with you.

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: The reward in the next life will certainly be better for you than worldly gains.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Lord will soon grant you sufficient favors to please you.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you as an orphan and give you shelter?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you wandering about and give you guidance?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And did He not find you in need and make you rich?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Do not oppress the orphans

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: and do not reject the beggars

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: and proclaim the bounties of your Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), have We not comforted your heart,

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: relieved you of the burden

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: which had been a heavy weight upon your back

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: and granted you an exalted reputation?

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: After every difficulty there is relief.

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Certainly, after every difficulty there comes relief.

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: When you are free from (your obligations), strive hard (to worship God)

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: and be devoted to your Lord's service.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig, by the olive,

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: by Mount Sinai

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: and by this inviolable city, Mecca.

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: We have created the human being in the best form

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: and We shall make him the lowest of low

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: except the righteously striving believers who will have a never ending reward.

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: After (knowing) this, what makes you still disbelieve in the Day of Judgment?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is God not the best of the Judges?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), read in the name of your Lord who created (all things).

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: He created man from a clot of blood.

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Recite! Your Lord is the most Honorable One,

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: who, by the pen, taught the human being:

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: He taught the human being what he did not know.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: Despite this, the human being still tends to rebel

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: because he thinks that he is independent.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: However, (all things) will return to your Lord.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who prohibits

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: a servant of Ours from prayer?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: What will happen if the praying person is rightly guided

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: or if he commands others to maintain piety!?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: What will happen if the prohibiting rejects the Truth and turns away from it!?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he not realize that God sees him?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: Let him know that if he does not desist, We shall certainly drag him by his forelocks,

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: his lying sinful forelock.

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: Let him call on his associates for help

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: and We too will call the stern and angry keepers of hell.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: (Muhammad), never yield to him! Prostrate yourself and try to come closer to God.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: We revealed the Quran on the Night of Destiny.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what the Night of Destiny is!

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: (Worship) on the Night of Destiny is better than (worship) for a thousand months.

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: On this Night, the angels and the spirit descend by the permission of their Lord with His decree (to determine everyone's destiny).

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: This Night is all peace until the break of dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: The disbelievers among the People of the Book and the pagans disbelieved (in Islam) only after receiving divine testimony:

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: a Messenger (Muhammad) from God, reciting to them parts of the purified,

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: holy Book which contain eternal laws of guidance.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Nor did the People of the Book disagreed among themselves until after receiving the ancient divine testaments.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: They were only commanded to worship God, be uprightly devoted to His religion, steadfast in prayer and pay the zakat. This is truly the eternal religion.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: The disbelievers among the People of the Book and the pagans will dwell forever in hell; they are the worst of all creatures.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: The righteously striving believers are the best of all creatures.

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Their reward from their Lord will be the gardens of Eden wherein streams flow and wherein they will live forever. God will be pleased with them and they will be pleased with Him. This (reward) is for those who fear their Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken by a terrible quake

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: and it throws out its burden,

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: the human being will say (in horror), "What is happening to it?"

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: On that day the earth will declare all (the activities of the human being) which have taken place on it,

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: having been inspired by your Lord.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: On that day, people will come out of their graves in different groups to see (the results of) their own deeds.

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: Whoever has done an atom's weight of good,

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
