verses.translation: will see it and whoever has done an atom's weight of evil, will also see it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: (I swear) by the snorting chargers (of the warriors), whose hoofs strike against the rocks

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: and produce sparks

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: while running during a raid at dawn,

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: and leave behind a cloud of dust

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: which engulfs the enemy.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: The human being is certainly ungrateful to his Lord.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: He himself knows this very well.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: He certainly has a strong love for wealth and riches.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Does he not know that on the day when those in the graves are resurrected

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: and all that is in the hearts is made public,

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: their Lord will examine his deeds?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The (unprecedented) crash!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the crash?

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what the crash is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: On that day, people will be like scattered moths

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: and mountains will be like carded wool.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: Those whose good deeds will weigh heavier (on the scale)

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: will live a pleasant life,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: but those whose good deeds will be lighter (on the scale).

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: will have hawiyah as their dwelling.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what hawiya his?

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: It is a burning Fire.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: The desire to have more of the worldly gains have pre-occupied you so much (that you have neglected remembring God),

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: until you come to the graves.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: You shall know.

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: You shall cetainly know (about the consequences of your deeds).

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: You will certainly have the knowledge of your deeds beyond all doubt.

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: You will be shown hell

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: and you will see it with your own eyes.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, on that day, you will be questioned about the bounties (of God).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By the time (of the advent of Islam),

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: the human being is doomed to suffer loss,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: except the righteously striving believers who exhort each other to truthful purposes and to patience.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe to every slanderer and backbiter

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: who collects and hordes wealth,

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: thinking that his property will make him live forever.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: By no means! They will be thrown into hutamah.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what hutamah is!

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: It is a fierce fire created by God

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: to penetrate into the hearts.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: It will engulf them.

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: in its long columns of flames.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with the people of the elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not cause their evil plots to fail

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: by sending against them flocks of swallows

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: which showered them with small pebbles of clay

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: to turn them into (something) like the left-over grass grazed by cattle.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For God's favors to them during their summer and winter journeys,

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: Quraish should worship the Lord of this House.

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: It is He who has fed them when they were hungry

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: and has made them secure from fear.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who calls the religion a lie?

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: It is he who turns down the orphans

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and never encourages the feeding of the destitute.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Woe to the worshippers

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: who become confused during their prayers,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: who show off (his good deeds)

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: and refuse to help the needy.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), We have granted you abundant virtue.

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: So worship your Lord and make sacrificial offerings.

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Whoever hates you will himself remain childless.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), tell the disbelievers,

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: "I do not worship what you worship,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: nor do you worship what I worship

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: I have not been worshipping what you worshipped,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: nor will you worship what I shall worship.

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: You follow your religion and I follow mine.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), when help and victory comes from God,

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: you will see large groups of people embracing the religion of God.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: Glorify your Lord with praise and ask Him for forgivenes. He accepts repentance.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: May he too perish!

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: His property and worldly gains will be of no help to him.

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: He will suffer in a blazing fire

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: and so too will his wife who (threw thorns and firewood in the Prophet's way). Around her neck will be a rope of palm fibre.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), say, "He is the only God.

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: God is Absolute.

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: He neither begets nor was He begotten.

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: There is no one equal to Him.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), say, "I seek protection from the Lord of the Dawn

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: against the evil of whatever He has created.

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: I seek His protection against the evil of the invading darkness,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: from the evil of those who practice witchcraft

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: and from the evil of the envious ones.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: (Muhammad), say, "I seek protection from the Cherisher of mankind,

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: the King of mankind,

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: the Lord of mankind

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: against the evil of the temptations of the satans,

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: of jinn and human beings

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: who induce temptation into the hearts of mankind.
